layers.name: Regression (TypeCheck + Lint)

layers.name: E2E Tests

layers.name: Code Review
layers.notes: MEDIUM fixed: gh pr list --head '@' bug (now fetches branch first), server-side codex timeout added (5 min). No HIGH issues.

layers.name: Codex 红队审查
layers.notes: Round 1: 4 MEDIUM findings fixed (kill-on-cancel, stale flowchart key, utility route regression, process pointer prep). Round 2: 1 MEDIUM finding fixed (process pointer identity guard). Converged after round 2.

layers.name: PR 创建 + Claude Review
layers.notes: PR #21 created. Claude Review: HIGH=0 (passes). MEDIUM=1 fixed (analysisToken concurrency guard). LOW=3 fixed (cache Zod validation, error message leak, formatTimeAgo NaN). 1 fix round total.
